explains: n. 壮丽，雄伟；（社会地位的）高贵

sentences.en: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status.
sentences.cn: 柱子被用于建筑通常是为了增添宏伟和高贵。

sentences.en: Venezuela is the ideal starting point to explore the grandeur and natural beauty of South America.
sentences.cn: 委内瑞拉是探索南美的宏伟壮观与自然美景的理想出发点。

sentences.en: Ah, now thou'lt know what state and grandeur be!
sentences.cn: 啊，现在你知道什么是壮丽和宏伟了！
